subject: Baseball
Computer and Video Games
lead_paragraph: Vic Black, a 26-year-old right-hander who struggled in previous spring camps, has found that video games help soothe the anxieties that come with competing for an opening day roster spot.
snippet: Vic Black, a 26-year-old right-hander who struggled in previous spring camps, has found that video games help soothe the anxieties that come with competing for an opening day roster spot.
